title: Interpretation of a dream about water falling from the roof of a house in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams about water falling from the roof of a house in a dream. We may want to know the interpretation of a dream about water falling from the roof of a house in a dream. It is one of the dreams that make the dreamer feel very anxious, but he wants to know an explanation for that. We will learn about its interpretation in the following lines, which are the interpretations of some diligent scholars and site managers. They do not interfere in interpretations, but rather convey the interpretations of scholars. Interpretation of a dream about water falling from the roof of a house in a dream: We may find that water falling from the roof of the house is a warning sign of a problem that the people of the house may face during those days. Water falling from the roof of the house in a dream may indicate the occurrence of Troubles for the people of the house at that time, and God knows best. Seeing water falling from the roof of the house in a dream may indicate many disputes and problems between family members at that time. Whoever saw in his dream that the roof of the house was pouring water from it, perhaps it indicates the extravagance of a lot of money. The money is in a place that is of no use to it, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about a neighbor’s building collapsing in a dream: If you see the neighbor’s building collapsing, this may indicate a crisis that the neighbors may be exposed to during this time, and God knows best. We find that the collapse of the neighbor’s building in a dream could indicate some problems and crises. What this family is suffering from, and God knows best. In the event that one sees his neighbors’ house falling down, the walls may indicate a financial crisis that the neighbors may be exposed to during this period. The collapse of the neighbor’s house in a dream may indicate the arrival of sorrows for the owners of the house, and God knows best. Interpretation Dreaming of oil falling on the ground in a dream: In the event that you see oil falling on the ground, this may indicate what comes after the turmoil that occurred in the life of the dreamer during those days. Whoever dreams of oil falling on the ground may indicate that he was going through a financial crisis at that time, and God knows best. Seeing oil falling to the ground may indicate financial disturbances and crises that the dreamer may suffer from in those days. A person’s dream that oil has fallen to the ground may indicate changes in his life for the worse. He must ask God for help. Interpretation of a dream about a body falling from the sky in a dream: If one sees that his body has fallen from the sky, this may indicate a problem that the dreamer fell into during this period, and God knows best. His body falling from the sky may indicate a disaster and troubles that may occur. The dreamer suffers from it on those days. In the event that one sees a body falling from the sky, this may indicate pollution and competition that occurred to the visions during this time. In the event that one sees that there is a body falling from the sky, this may indicate that some disturbances have occurred in the dreamer’s life in Those days, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream of an old house falling in a dream: In the event that my personal opinion is that an old house has fallen and collapsed, this may indicate some problems and fears that the dreamer is suffering from in his life and that they will soon end. An old house falling in a dream may indicate the end of a period Difficult for the dreamer. A person’s dream of an old house collapsing may indicate some disturbances that occurred in his life during those days. It is possible that seeing an old house collapsing in...

title: Interpretation of seeing a woman’s thigh in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a woman’s thigh in a dream. The thigh is the area above the leg on which the body rests, and seeing it in a dream in good health indicates strength, money, family ties, and defects and shortcomings that affect the family and money, such as poverty. And illness and death, and we will explain this in detail. Interpretation of seeing a woman's thigh in a dream of a man or an unmarried young man or an unmarried or married girl or a pregnant woman or a divorced or widowed woman, and we present the interpretations of senior interpreters such as Imam Muhammad bin Sirin and other scholars in the interpretation of visions and dreams to be with us on the Vision website. Interpretation of a woman's thigh in a dream by Imam Ibn Sirin Seeing the thigh and knee in a dream This indicates prostration and prostration, movement, travel, and place. Seeing the thigh in a dream indicates what a person collects and spends from money. Seeing the large knee bone indicates the release of conscience and the release of conscience, and it may indicate the completion of prayer and maintaining its performance upon their death. Seeing a traveler's leg broken or injured and bleeding announces a holiday and you are prohibited from traveling. What is the interpretation of a dream about the thigh for a married woman? Seeing the thigh of a married woman soft and beautiful It indicates marital happiness and good luck in life and the fulfillment of one's desires. Seeing an iron man This may indicate longevity. See the thigh cut It indicates separation and death. What is the interpretation of a dream about a wound in the right thigh? Seeing a wound in the thigh indicates problems and concerns and may indicate Illness. Seeing a wounded thigh in a dream for an unmarried woman indicates the occurrence of many problems. Seeing a girl who loves her thigh indicates adventures that may make her commit many mistakes. Seeing a beautiful and healthy foot indicates an abundance of money and what is in the leg of a defect and deficiency due to money deficiency and need. Seeing a beautiful thigh in a married woman's dream and being affected by it indicates problems with the husband and his view of another woman. What is the interpretation of the thigh in Al-Osaimi's dream? Seeing the thigh in a dream indicates strength, solidity and family cohesion. Seeing the thigh exposed indicates exposure to marital or family problems. Seeing the thigh cut indicates alienation and distance from the homeland. What is the interpretation of exposing the thigh in a dream for a single woman? If a single girl sees that she exposes her thigh and loves it, it indicates failure, success and failure. Seeing the thigh amputated means that he heard bad news and may predict death for the traveler. What is the interpretation of a dream of exposing a leg and thigh for an unmarried woman? If a girl sees that she loves her leg and thigh, it indicates disappointment in love, marriage and bad luck. If a girl feels severe pain in her leg And her thigh, which indicates abuse of some people and bad morals. What is the interpretation of a dream about the appearance of thigh hair? Seeing a copper thigh indicates many sins and transgressions. Seeing hair on the thigh indicates financial problems and the accumulation of debts or loss of money and loss, and seeing white hair may indicate that the debt has been spent. We are pleased to see the reception of your dream about “Interpretation of seeing the female thigh” through the comments and the dream team will interpret your dream and respond and communicate with you.

title: Interpretation of seeing onions in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about onions by Ibn Sirin: In a dream, it is a sign of scandal and is one of the unwanted visions of the monarch. A dream about onions is evidence of crying, sadness, and revealing the secrets that the dreamer hides. Seeing rotten onions for a man indicates marriage to a disabled woman. Rotten onions in a dream for a sick person is evidence of Get well soon. Interpretation of seeing onions for Nabulsi. Seeing white onions in a dream is evidence of sadness and excessive fatigue. Seeing red onions in a dream indicates enemies and conspiracies. A person far from God’s dream of onions indicates committing sins and disobedience. Interpretation of a dream of onions for a single woman. Onions in a dream for an unmarried girl is evidence of False. Onions indicate cancellation of an engagement. Onions in a dream indicate gossip that appears from the neighbors around them. Cutting onions means completing wedding arrangements. Interpretation of seeing onions for a married woman. Seeing onions in a married woman’s dream is a sign of false pregnancy. Onions show that the husband is making A lot of effort to obtain money and livelihood. Chopping onions in a dream is for the success of a married woman and a lot of living. Interpretation of a dream about onions for a pregnant woman. Onions in a dream for a pregnant woman is evidence of easy childbirth. Seeing a pregnant woman peeling onions in a dream is evidence of a loss of tension. Interpretation of seeing onions for a manSeeing onions For a man, it symbolizes hardship and fatigue. Green onions in a man’s dream indicate a lot of money. A large handful of onions is evidence of good visions. Seeing onions drying in a dream is evidence that the dreamer has a jealous neighbor who is very jealous of him. Seeing a dry onion harvest is evidence of many problems that He faces it. As for red onions in a dream, they indicate livelihood, money, and good offspring. Seeing onions indicates immorality and sins. Cutting onions in a man’s dream is a sign of positive changes occurring in the dreamer’s life. If a person sees in a dream that he is carrying red onions, this indicates On immorality and committing many sins. Interpretation of the vision of offering onions. Interpretation of the vision of giving onions to a specific person in a dream is evidence of the existence of a strong relationship between you and this person. If the onions are to your manager at work, it is evidence of the strong relationship between you and him. Giving onions to someone more than once in a row It indicates bad and unpleasant things. Giving onions to a divorced woman is evidence of the vicissitudes of the dreamer’s life and his need for someone to stand by him. Giving green onions in a dream is strong evidence of the strong relationship between the dreamer and the other party. Interpretation of seeing cooking onions in a dream Seeing a free girl The fact that she is cooking Onions are evidence that she may soon marry the boy of her dreams. The girl will marry a good man with good morals and customs. It is a vision and dream of cooking onions, in and of themselves, good dreams that give the dreamer optimism in life. If a married woman sees that she is cooking onions in her dream, this is strong evidence that she is raising her children. Well and beautifully. Dreaming about eating cooked onions is a negative dream that indicates a difficult and difficult living situation. Interpretation of a dream about onions for a divorced woman. Seeing onions on a divorced woman indicates

title: Interpretation of the dream of seeing a bank in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Imam Al-Sadiq

preview.html: Interpretation of the dream of seeing a bank in a dream and the interpretation of the good and evil of seeing banks in a dream according to what is stated in the dream interpretation books and the correct ideas of Arab scholars, such as seeing a bank in a picture. The dream symbolizes many indicators in our lives, due to constant thinking about how to obtain money, many dream of People see a bank in a dream, so they wonder about the correct interpretation of the meaning of seeing a bank. What is the interpretation of seeing a bank loan? The interpretation of the dream about the bank account, the interpretation of the dream about the Bank of Egypt or the dream about the National Bank, the interpretation of the bank robbery, and other questions that we will receive answers to by specifying the interpretation of the dream about the bank in the dream in detail. Interpretation of the dream about the bank for a single woman: The interpretation of her entering the bank in a dream for a single woman and withdrawing money is evidence of her feeling of lack of confidence. In the people around her and her reluctance to marry anyone who proposes to her. The interpretation of seeing a bank in a dream where thieves are robbing indicates that single women must review all their relationships and situations with others. Interpretation of a dream about a bank for a married woman: The interpretation of a dream about a bank in a married woman’s dream explains the extent to which Stability and a feeling of protection and security with her husband. Seeing entering a bank in a dream, either for the purpose of withdrawal or deposit, is evidence that he will achieve a good and abundant livelihood in his life. Interpretation of a dream of depositing money in a bank: Seeing a bank deposit in a dream is evidence of the dreamer’s desire to get rid of the risks that Surrounding him. As for the interpretation of depositing jewelry or gold in the bank, it indicates that the dreamer will maintain the relationship between him and the person he loves. It also indicates that the regular relationship pattern will be transformed into a romantic relationship that ends in marriage for me. Interpretation of seeing the banking machine: Seeing a bank machine in a dream is evidence of... Good behavior on the part of the dreamer and that he is able to manage his life accurately and in order. Depositing money in an ATM indicates that his wealth will soon increase in his life. Seeing depositing money in an ATM is evidence that he is free of debt and has many successes in his life. Interpretation of a dream Bank card: If you see in a dream that you are withdrawing money with a bank card, this indicates the dreamer’s fairness and freedom from his fears and sorrows. Seeing a bank card for a pregnant woman is a sign of the safety of her and her fetus and the abundant livelihood that she will soon have. Interpretation of the dream of obtaining a loan from the bank: Vision A loan from the bank means charity from the lender of the person who lends to him. The loan also indicates the repentance of the sinner and the rich to the poor.

title: Interpretation of seeing the dead coming back to life

preview.html: But there are differences in the different interpretations that revolve around seeing the dead person alive again, or perhaps seeing him dead and then returning again at the same time. They are all different interpretations and connections, which we will learn about now from the interpreter. Com.Interpretation of seeing the dead coming back to life in a dream for an unmarried girl who sees the dead come back to life and tells those around him that he is alive indicates the presence of good things. Ibn Sirin believes that the girl who brings back the dead indicates the state of the dead and therefore it is a praiseworthy dream. Seeing the dead person coming back to life indicates that he is in a good place later. It could be evidence of the dreamer’s good condition in general. If a girl sees that the dead person she knows comes back to life and she is crying loudly, this indicates her need for prayer. She should For a girl to give alms to the spirit of the dead that she sees in her dreams and that keeps coming to her. Also, seeing the dead man in a dream come back and smile at her with life and talk to her, this means a lot of kindness, livelihood and her marriage. An unmarried woman who dreams of a dead man returning to life is among Visions that are generally praised and portend good things. This girl who dreams of the dead returning to life will be blessed with a lot to live on. The dead man speaking to the girl in her dream and shaking her with his hands indicates the good deeds of the dead person and that he is in the bliss of the afterlife. An unmarried woman who sees a dead man in In reality, and embracing him in a dream, this indicates that she will die in good deeds. See also: Interpretation of a dream about the dead kissing the living. Interpretation of seeing the dead coming back to life in a dream for a married woman. A married woman who sees in her dream the dead person returning to life smiling, shows her satisfaction with it. The deceased is satisfied with the married woman who He sees her in his dream, and he is happy with her raising her children with good morals. If a married woman sees that she sees her father or mother returning to life but is unhappy. It shows that she is currently experiencing problems with her husband. The condition of a married woman who sees one of her relatives returning to life happily indicates that A lot of sustenance will soon come to her and her husband. If this vision is repeated with a married woman, it indicates that a dead person is coming to her and taking her, which indicates the loss of a relative of hers. Seeing the dead coming back to life, but in a misleading way, indicates that the deceased did not have A smooth journey in life. – Offering supplication for the dead who comes to a married woman in her dream, especially if he does not deserve praise and worry. Interpretation of seeing the dead come back to life in a dream about a man and its meaning. A man who dreams that someone comes back to life and takes something from the dead, means that he He will have a lot of happiness. The dead person who comes to the man and asks him for something in his dream, such as returning money or a debt. This indicates that the dreamer is honest and characterized by honesty and tolerance in life, so you must do good to get it. Taking the dead person from the dreamer means harm Or the misfortune or worries to which the dreamer is exposed. If h

title: Interpretation of thorns in a dream

preview.html: In this article, we present to you the interpretation of the thorn and its meaning in detail in different cases. The word thorns makes some people’s bodies tremble as soon as they hear it, from the harm and shock it causes to the skin immediately. It resembles a needle point and can be seen in many plants, such as cactus and prickly pear, along with certain types of flowers. Sometimes it causes anxiety and tension for fear of approaching it, but the most important question remains: Does seeing thorns in a dream bode well for the dreamer, or is it one of those hateful dreams that Indicate trouble for him actually? Interpretation scholars such as Ibn Sirin and Imam al-Sadiq analyze the meaning of this dream. Interpretation of thorns in a dreamInterpretation of seeing thorns in a dream by Ibn SirinImam Ibn Sirin narrated that seeing thorns in a dream carries many symbols, including that it indicates ignorance, fanaticism, and the emergence of temptations. Being afflicted with thorns in a dream indicates To harm the dreamer in reality. If the dreamer sees that he is walking on thorns, then this dream indicates escaping from a problem in reality. As for seeing a lot of thorny plants, this vision shows the dreamer’s bad character. Imam Al-Sadiq’s interpretation of a dream about thorns for a man. Imam Al-Sadiq’s interpretation of seeing thorns In a dream, as evidence of facing some problems in the dreamer’s life, in the event that he sees his hand full of thorns. If the dreamer sees that thorns are hitting his leg in a dream, this vision symbolizes the wrong path that he is really taking and he must pay attention to it. If a man sees that his hand has been hit by thorns Many, then this vision indicates that he will face many problems in his life. If he is sitting on the ground of a garden with thorns in his hand, then this vision indicates his search for a job opportunity in reality. Interpretation of a dream about thorns for a single woman. As for the meaning of this dream for an unmarried woman, in If she sees thorns spreading near flowers, she tries to pick one of them, but she is afraid to approach these thorns, as this vision expresses her feeling of fear and anxiety about them. It happened in her life. If an unmarried woman sees that she is plucking a rose and finds thorns stuck to her finger, then this vision indicates her inability to make the right decisions. As for an unmarried woman who sees many thorns stuck to her hand and she cannot remove them, this vision is an indication of difficulties and problems. Which she faces in her life, and God knows best. Prickly pears in a dream for a married woman. As for the meaning of this dream for a married woman, when she sees in a dream that she was harmed by prickly pears when she ate them, then this dream indicates the emergence of problems in her life. In the event that a married woman dreams that her son He is playing in a garden full of thorns, then this vision indicates that he is actually sick, and God knows best. But if a married woman sees that her husband is in pain from the thorns stuck in his hand and he is unable to remove them, then this vision symbolizes the accumulation of debts on him in reality. Interpretation of seeing thorns in a dream for a pregnant woman: The symbol of this dream is for a pregnant woman, so if she dreams that her husband is in pain from his thorny hand, then this is...

title: Interpretation and interpretation of a dream about giving gold to a dead person to a living person in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a dead person giving gold to a living person. The dream or vision revolves around the events that pass in the dream quickly and sequentially. Dreams express things that occupy a person’s mind and you see them in the form of dreams in a dream. Sometimes dreams show events or changes that will occur in that person’s life. There are dreams that serve as A warning sign for the person who sees this dream. Gold is an expensive metal. It is made and shaped by adding copper in this. So what is the interpretation of the dream of the dead giving gold to the living? Interpretation of the dream of the deceased giving a gold ring. This vision is considered one of the visions and dreams that bode well, as it is about money and following a great diet. Also in the dream, it is livelihood and kindness that this person receives, and we will tell you the most important interpretations related to this vision: An unmarried girl marries someone she loves when she sees in her dream that someone gives her a golden ring. Likewise, a man gets a promotion in his job when he dreams that a dead person gives him a ring. Gold. Also, an unmarried young man will soon get married when he dreams of a dead man giving him a gold ring. Seeing a dead person giving a gold ring in a person’s dream means that this dead person wants charity or begging. Moreover, the merchant makes money in his trade, so when he sees him dead In his dream, he gives him a gold ring. In addition, a pregnant woman gives birth to a male child when she dreams that a dead man gives her a gold ring. A divorced woman also gets rid of her worries and troubles when she sees that a dead man gives her gold in her dream. In addition, the person receives an inheritance. It is great when he sees that the deceased has received a silver ring in his dream. See also: Interpretation of the dream of preparing for a wedding in a dream. Interpretation of the dream of giving the deceased gold to a married woman. Seeing yourself giving gold in a dream is an indication of the kindness and livelihood offered to the married woman who sees this thing, as well as an indication On the psychological comfort in which she lives: A married woman will soon bear it when she dreams that a dead person gives her a gold ring. She also falls into a problem and cannot get out of it when she dreams that a dead man gives her a golden ring and then takes it from her against her will. The deceased is also satisfied with her daughter. When she dreams that her mother gives her gold bracelets. Moreover, this woman will soon get better and bring good news. In addition, a woman’s life changes for the better when she listens to the advice of a close person, when she sees that her mother gives her gold in her dream. Likewise, a woman embodies Her deeds and qualities of a dead man when she sees him giving her gold in her dream. Also, a woman’s material conditions will improve for the better if she sees in a dream that a dead person is giving her a gold necklace. In addition, a woman is afraid to give birth when she sees that a dead man is giving her a piece of gold in her dream See also: Interpretation of dreams to see a dead person asking for a bath in detail. A dream about a dead person giving gold to a single person. Gold for an unmarried girl is engagement or marriage, and in a dream her wedding date is approaching, as well as the end of the problems and obstacles that she has suffered from.

title: Ibn Sirin’s interpretations of seeing a living father in a dream

preview.html: Seeing a living father in a dream is considered one of the good visions that often convey good messages, send feelings of affirmation or direct the fortuneteller to take successful steps in life, but if the father is angry, surprised, or sad and pity, then these are other connotations and may be undesirable or warning. Of danger or decision surrounding him. A mistake that the viewer catches and regrets, and other meanings and interpretations. Seeing a living father in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Seeing a living father in a dream. The correct interpretation of this vision depends on the father’s behavior in the dream and the situation that the dreamer is going through at the present time, as well as on the son’s attitude towards him. And his feelings towards him. If the son holds his father’s hand and follows him, this means that he is in dire need of his father’s protection and a sense of safety and security that he lacks at the present time. It also expresses the need for the dreamer to take advice from a person with a good opinion who can provide the correct advice that enables him to Making the appropriate decision regarding an important issue related to his future. While there are some interpreters who believe that it is a warning of a danger approaching the dreamer to whom he is indifferent, perhaps it comes from a friend whom he believes and is not aware of his betrayal. But if the father shouts loudly and argues with the dreamer, this indicates However, the dreamer is about to take wrong steps in his life or enter into a relationship that will cause him a lot of losses. You still cannot find an interpretation of your dream? Go to Google and search the Egyptian Dream Interpretation Site. Seeing a living father in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin believes that this vision varies in meaning between the good that bodes well, but it also has some unfavorable meanings, depending on the father’s actions and appearance and the son’s attitude towards him. If the father smiles at his son This is a message of reassurance to the dreamer, foretelling the end of these worries and sorrows and his exit from the crises he is facing in the current period. However, if the father appears angry, this is evidence that the fortuneteller is behaving in an inappropriate manner that is not consistent with his family’s good conduct and the sound morals with which he grew up. Seeing the father Neighborhood in a single woman’s dreamThis vision often indicates difficulties that the dreamer is exposed to in his life and he feels an overwhelming desire to help or feels weak and unable to protect himself. If the father is talking to her, this is an indication that she will be able to make the appropriate decision regarding this matter It is important related to her future and she cannot determine her correct destination with it. It also indicates that she will marry someone who has many of her father’s qualities and that she loves, and will work hard to make her happy, protect her, and give her a good life in the future. It is also a message of reassurance to her, to calm her heart and believe that the Lord (Almighty and Majestic) will send He supports her and protects her from the problems and dangers she is currently facing. But if her father is far from her, this indicates his satisfaction with the step he is about to take, and that he will achieve profit and success through it. Seeing a living father in a dream for a married womanBasically, this vision is associated with many problems and conflicts. Which the owner faces

title: Interpretation of seeing locusts in a dream for single, pregnant and married women and different situations

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing locusts in a dream for single, pregnant, married and various cases. Insects vary in the world. There are some insects that carry poison and others do not harm humans. There are some scary insects that many people fear, especially when they see them in a dream. Among these insects are locusts that are small in size but There is a type of them that carries poison and can kill a person. In this article today we will learn together the interpretation of seeing grasshoppers in a dream for single, pregnant and married women and for different occasions. Interpretation of the dream of seeing grasshoppers in a dream: Locusts symbolize unpleasant events from the point of view of the scholar Ibn Sirin. As for the interpretation of the meaning of seeing Locusts falling from the sky, it symbolizes water that is about to fall from the sky. Likewise, seeing himself in a dream eating grasshoppers is what indicates that he will get a lot of money, and seeing himself eating green grasshoppers, it symbolizes sustenance and great goodness. Which approaches a person. Seeing locusts in a dream can indicate discord and chaos between people and among themselves, or it can symbolize many sins and transgressions. Likewise, locusts in a dream may symbolize that the dreamer will become poor or fall into life’s problems. Interpretation Dream of seeing grasshoppers in a dream for a married woman. Locusts in a dream symbolize goodness, happiness and joy in the dream. Likewise, if a married woman sees grasshoppers in a dream, it means that this woman will receive goodness for about a year. On the contrary, if a lady sees a grasshopper in a dream This symbolizes the presence of a jealous woman in her life. While Ibn Sirin explains the dream of a married woman to be a purified locust, this indicates the occurrence of pregnancy, and God knows best. Interpretation of the dream of seeing grasshoppers in a dream for single people. The scholar Ibn Sirin interprets seeing locusts in a dream by an unmarried woman according to It is a sign that she will meet a bad friend in life, so she must be careful not to fall into the trap of a bad friendship. But if she sees in her dream that she is being attacked by locusts or that they are harming her, this symbolizes that she may be exposed to trouble. Likewise, locusts falling from the sky On a woman in a dream it may indicate that goodness will come to her from heaven. If a girl sees that she is eating locusts, this indicates that she will marry an empty-nester; Because she does not have noble qualities. Interpretations of grasshopper dreams in a woman’s dream vary according to many indicators. The abundance of locusts, their attack, and their invasion of the single’s home, room, or workplace, is a sign of many worries and problems in her life. While in the case of seeing the locusts calm and not attacking, his vision may be about the breadth of feeding, and wishes and good conditions will come true, especially if the locusts come in green in the A dream. A single woman’s vision of a place full of locusts fighting or crowding each other indicates an increase in crises and an increase in problems in her life, and God knows best. The grasshopper symbolizes gossip, gossip, and mobs, especially if its color is black, red,

title: Interpretation of the vision of the deceased Attia

preview.html: The interpretation of the gift of the dead in dreams shows many different interpretations. It can indicate the presence of a huge inheritance for this fortune teller because it shows that he will get good things within a few days and his life will improve for the better. Read also: Seeing a promise in a dream Interpretation of the vision of the deceased as a gift Interpretation of the vision of the deceased as a gift The interpretation of seeing the gift of the deceased can be a sign to the dreamer to clarify some things that he does not know, or it can be a help to him in a matter that occupies his mind to the point of confusion. In this article, we will discuss all the interpretations and meanings of seeing the gift of the dead of food, drink or clothing. Read also: Entering the Police College in a dream Interpretation of seeing the deceased as a gift by Ibn Sirin The interpretation of seeing the gift of the dead in a dream according to Ibn Sirin has multiple connotations, including: Whoever dreams that he eats with the dead, may God prolong his life. And whoever sees the dead giving him good food, he takes it. If the deceased gives him a clean and new shirt, he will get a livelihood similar to his life. If he dreams of taking good clothes, poverty will affect him, and if he wears a dirty dress, He commits sins. And whoever sees that the dead has given him honey, he will obtain spoils from where he does not expect. And whoever dreams that he gave him a watermelon, he won something he did not expect, as if the dead is warning him or giving him a valuable lesson, he will achieve justice in his religion. And if he sees that he gave the dead his clothes and he did not wear them, this is evidence of harm to his livelihood, and his infection with an incurable disease, God forbid. Read also: Backgrounds in a dream Seeing a dead man’s gift in a dream in Al-Nabulsi Whoever sees in a dream a dead person given bread, this is evidence of livelihood or money, coming to him from someone else from a place he does not want. Interpretation of a dream in which the dead gives food and drink If the dreamer sees in a dream that he is giving the dead food or feeding him with his hand or drinking it, this is evidence of harm and destruction of the opinion. One What if you give the dead watermelon, this is evidence of the dreamer’s dealing with tension and anxiety for the living, and in his case if he gives his uncle or aunt food after her death, he can get food. Read also: Carrying a friend’s hand in a dream Interpretation of a dream in which the dead gives a dress Dreaming that the dead gives him a dress, his money will be afflicted with something bad, or he will be afflicted with a disease, and he will be cured by it, God willing. But if he gives him what the living wore, he may die, God forbid. As for the organs of the deceased that are forged and lent to keep without being the property of the deceased, this may indicate that no harm or evil will touch him, God willing. Interpretation of a dream about obtaining food and drink from the dead Whoever sees in a dream that the dead has given him food or drink and he did not eat anything from it, this is evidence of a lack of money for the living in the amount of this missing food, so it is not counted. Read also: Seeing pins in a dream Interpretation of a dream about receiving clothes from the dead Seeing giving up clothes in a dream has multiple meanings: If he sees a dead person giving him something to wear and the dreamer wears it, he may get tired of an illness or be afflicted with it, God forbid. And if he sees that the deceased gave him washed clothes, the dreamer can become rich. But if the dress in the dream is new or old, then
